blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary:
impermanence

 imperamence is a laidback, member driven marauders era rp coming soon to jcink! we feature a true shipper...
caption:
impermanence

imperamence is a laidback, member driven marauders era rp coming soon to jcink! we feature a true shipper application that promotes good plotting, no word count, and relaxed activity rules. our aim is to foster a creative and welcoming community that allows us to write our own stories.

the plot ● the staff search ● the reservations

summary:
Slytherin: What did you do today?
Gryffindor: Well. I could study for my final tomorrow or I could get a tattoo.
Slytherin:...
body:
Slytherin: What did you do today?

Gryffindor: Well. I could study for my final tomorrow or I could get a tattoo.

Slytherin: What’s that bandage about on your arm?

Gryffindor: I think you know what that bandage means.

summary: Shop: The House of Minalima, Greek Street, London The shop, which is located on the ground floor, is as beautifully decorated as...
caption:
Shop: The House of Minalima, Greek Street, London

The shop, which is located on the ground floor, is as beautifully decorated as the three floors of displays, so it is worth taking the time to take a look, even if you have no intention of buying any merchandise. 

The shop sells a wide range of collectible items, from Prints to Posters and from Badges to Magnets, having expanded its selection from when the shop first opened in 2016. They don’t just sell Harry Potter and Fantastic Beasts Merchandise, they also sell other books they have designed among other items.

Little Tip for Fans: The merchandise is not cheap, but they is a great selection of items for reasonable prices. It is worth taking a look at the website or checking into the shop as there are some great discounts available from time to time.

blog.name: harrypotterfanfictionwriter
blog.title: FanficWriter
blog.description: Hello everyone, welcome on my blog! Do take a seat and keep your feet off the table. On this blog you will find fanfiction of almost every Harry Potter ship. I'm afraid most is going to be Drarry, since I adore those two together❤ However I do take requests! So be sure to send those in. Please don't post my stories elsewhere without my permission!

summary:
Cupboard
"Are you going to tell me about it" Draco asked, after he and Harry settled down in bed.
Harry looked at Draco,...
body:
Cupboard

“Are you going to tell me about it” Draco asked, after he and Harry settled down in bed.

Harry looked at Draco, frowning slightly.

“Only if you promise not to go and kill anyone”

Draco frowned, why would he kill someone? He just wanted to know why Hermione and the Weasleys had destroyed their cupboard under the stairs and made it into a bookshelf. They told him it was a housewarming gift, for his and Harry’s new house, but he didn’t believe it.

“Okay, I promise not to kill anyone” a soft light shined from his wand, marking the truth of the promise.

It was quiet after that, Draco waited patiently in the dark till Harry would talk. A deep sigh sounded, than Harry’s voice.

“You remember how I told you about how the Dursleys treated me?”

Draco nodded, yes he remembered. It had came as a big shock to him. How had such muggles dared to treat his boyfriend like that!

“Well I skipped a part. And please do remember your promise” at this part Harry squeezed him slightly.

“The first years of my life, a cupboard just like Hermione and the Weasleys just changed today in a bookshelf. Well such cupboard used to be my room”.

At this point Harry got quiet, cuddling Draco close.

“Just when you were a baby” Draco asked softly, tracing patterns on Harry’s arms to help him calm down.

Silence followed, than “No, till I got my Hogwarts letter”.

At this Draco tensed up in anger. How dared they to treat a child like that. If their using Harry as a personal house elf wasn’t worse enough, they also had dared to make him sleep in the tiniest room possible. No child should have been treated like that.

“Draco, darling are you still there” Harry’s voice shook slightly.

“Yes I’m still here. However if I didn’t made that promise I wouldn’t be. I would be there to lock them up in a cupboard the rest of their lives, torturing them for even daring to treat a child like that” Draco’s voice was fierce, laced with anger.

“Please calm down, it was not good. But I have a much better life now, I have friends who like me, a family and the most amazing boyfriend” at this Harry placed a kiss on top of Draco’s head.

Draco smiled softly, before speaking up again.

“I promise none of our houses will have a cupboard, we will destroy them all and change them for better. Never shall a cupboard be in our house and can even be used as such. That’s a promise to you Harry Potter”.

Upon these words, he got cuddled closely.

“I love you” was muttered.

“I love you too”.

summary:
UNLIKELY PLACES

 they are gathered one by one and then in droves: muggles, and soon squibs and muggleborns and anyone else...
caption:
UNLIKELY PLACES

they are gathered one by one and then in droves: muggles, and soon squibs and muggleborns and anyone else vulnerable to the ire of the death eaters. hidden away in safehouses across wizarding britain, protected by the order of the phoenix or by individual witches and wizards trying to do the right thing, they all stand on shaky ground, and nowhere is truly safe.

this and more on halys, a member-driven au marauders jcink premium site, set in 1981 at the height of the first wizarding war. we are now celebrating six months open - it’s the perfect time to join our community!

→ INDEX | GUIDEBOOK | CANON LIST | REQUESTS | SUBPLOT: SAFEHOUSE NETWORK

  • Characters: Harry Potter, Ginny Weasley, Teddy Lupin, Andromeda Black Tonks, Molly Weasley, Ron Weasley, Hermione Granger, George Weasley, Arthur Weasley, Vernon Dursley, Petunia Evans Dursley, Dudley Dursley, Fleur Delacour, Bill Weasley
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley

Read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2KvtFBx

blog.name: matrixaffiliate
blog.title: Matrixaffiliate
blog.description: Wife and mother in the beautiful Rocky Mountains writing Harry Potter fan-fiction. Hinny, Jily, Blackinnon, Tedoire, Romine.

tags: because it's au and snape got canned
title: Remain - Completed
body:
The LAST THREE CHAPTERS of Remain are up!

FFN and AO3

I can’t believe this is over! It has been an amazing ride and I’ve grown so much as a writer. This little story is now my longest and at 80K words I feel so proud. Thank you @thisismegz, who first requested this story back in July, this never would have happened without you! And it would have never been so wonderful without all of your amazing comments and input and I am so grateful for the support that you showed by following, favoriting, and commenting on this. I am truly humbled by your kindness. From the bottom of my heart, thank you!

body:
Draco: We're not doing that!
Harry: Why not?
Draco: It's vulgar, and Malfoys aren't vulgar
Harry: Your last name is Potter now, remember?
Draco: I knew I was going to pay for that some day

Typically about fictional characters.

Preferably in peace but if I have a terrible theory you wish to discuss by all means please act crazy with me.

(It tends to be about My Hero Academia)

summary: I never realized it until now but I really need the musical versions of Harry Potter (A Very Potter Musical) and Percy Jackson...
body: I never realized it until now but I really need the musical versions of Harry Potter (A Very Potter Musical) and Percy Jackson (The Lightning Thief: The Percy Jackson Musical) to meet. Like the level of chaotic energy alone intrigues me.

blog.name: r0undtablerival
blog.title: r0undtable rival
blog.description: I'm in a LOT of different communities and I prove that statement with this page.

body:
Harry Potter (books)

Hermione: So, what did we practice you would say to Harry?

Ginny: “Will you go out with me tomorrow night?”

Hermione: And what did you say to Harry?

Ginny: I accidentally told him to suck my dick.

Hermione: HOW DO YOU ACCIDENTALLY TELL SOMEONE TO SUCK YOUR DICK?!

Ginny: I PANICKED!

blog.name: tiffany1567
blog.title: The Equation of Mystery
blog.description:
"Mysteries are just puzzles created by human mind. If you think them over long enough, you can work out a logical situation. But no matter how many times they try to explain it to me, I can never figure out why one person would kill another. I can understand it in my head but it just doesn't make sense at all."
Tiffany | 31 | Artist Type | Florida | Navy Vet | Intersectional Feminist | Vegan | Writer | Open Mind | Demisexual | Creative

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!
